author: Tizianop6
body:
#### PR description:

Added validation plots to MtdTracksValidation in order to report track path length resolution, separated for ETL and BTL & reported as a function of some sim/reco kinematic/track helix variables.  Studies reported at MTD DPG meetings. 
Changes in output: only in DQM file with the addition of the plots.


#### PR validation:

Tested on full event generation chain up to DQM creation.
title: Adding track path length resolution plots to MtdTracksValidation
